title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion euros, with a total of 20 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion euros has increased over the Year
Revenue in billion euros is rapidly increasing from 2000 to 2003, gradually constant from 2003 to 2005, gradually increasing from 2005 to 2006, and lastly rapidly constant from 2006 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Max Revenue in billion euros about 5.5 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Revenue in billion euros about 0.46 was recorded at Year 2000
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion euros, with a total of 20 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2000 to 2007.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2019.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2009 to 2012.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
